programme.title: Taal
programme.desc: Mansi, a gifted singer from a humble background, rises to fame and is caught between two powerful men Manav, her first love, and Vikrant, her mentor. The film explores love, ambition, and social class, all set to A.R. Rahman's iconic music.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this action-comedy features Govinda and Sanjay Dutt as conmen Tara and Sitara. Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.desc: Mansi, a gifted singer from a humble background, rises to fame and is caught between two powerful men Manav, her first love, and Vikrant, her mentor. The film explores love, ambition, and social class, all set to A.R. Rahman's iconic music.

Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, itâ€™s the third installment in the Commando series.

programme.title: Taal
programme.desc: Mansi, a gifted singer from a humble background, rises to fame and is caught between two powerful men Manav, her first love, and Vikrant, her mentor. The film explores love, ambition, and social class, all set to A.R. Rahman's iconic music.

programme.title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
programme.desc: Suraj, an eligible bachelor, finds himself getting rejected by the families of many potential brides. Soon, he learns that a wedding detective named Madhu Mangal Rane is the reason.

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Kalyug stars Kunal Khemu in his debut adult role. The film follows his character's descent into the pornographic underworld after a personal tragedy. As he seeks revenge, he uncovers the industry's seedy operations, leading to a gripping narrative about morality and redemption.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: In this classic David Dhawan comedy, Raju, a railway coolie, is roped into a scheme to pose as a millionaire to marry the daughter of a status-obsessed man. As lies pile up, Raju juggles his dual identity, resulting in a series of humorous situations.
